update_available: A new version of SwitchCraft is available!
ai_helper_welcome:
Welcome to the AI Helper!
Ask me about silent switches or command line arguments.
msi_wrapper_tip: ðŸ’¡ Detected MSI Wrapper! Standard MSI switches may work.
ai_smalltalk_hello: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ How can I help you regarding packaging?
ai_smalltalk_who: I am SwitchCraft AI, your packaging assistant.
ai_smalltalk_what: I can identify silent switches, explain installer technologies, and assist with Intune errors. Just drag & drop a file!
ai_context_msi:
This is an MSI file. You should use standard MSI switches.
Command: msiexec /i "{filename}" /qn /norestart
ai_context_no_switches: I analyzed the file but couldn't find confirmed silent switches. It might not support silent installation.
ai_context_none: I haven't analyzed a file yet. Please drag and drop an installer first.
ai_rules_intune: Intune: Handle return codes (0=Success, 3010=Soft Reboot). Suppress all UI.
ai_rules_error1603: 1603: Generic Fatal Error. Check permissions, existing installs, or prerequisites.
ai_rules_error1618: 1618: Installation in progress. Kill other msiexec processes.
ai_rules_powershell: SwitchCraft can generate PowerShell scripts for you! Check the Analyzer tab.
ai_rules_macos: MacOS Support: DMG (Mount), PKG (Installer), APP (Bundle). I can generate install.sh scripts!
ai_fallback:
I'm a specialized packaging assistant. I can help with:
- Finding silent switches (Drag & Drop a file)
- Explaining installer types
- Intune error codes

Running locally ðŸ”’

privacy_note: Privacy Note: This AI runs locally. No data leaves your machine.

settings_channel_desc: Stable: Releases only | Beta: Pre-releases | Dev: Latest commits
ai_tip_extraction: âš ï¸ Tip: Installers using '/S' might be self-extracting archives (7-Zip SFX). If silent install fails, try extracting it first using 7-Zip!
settings_verify_incomplete: Please fill in all 3 fields (Tenant, Client ID, Secret).
settings_verify_success_msg:
Successfully authenticated with Microsoft Graph.
Permissions OK.
Credentials accepted and saved.
confirm_automation_msg:
This will attempt to:
1. Generate & Sign Script
2. Run Local Install/Uninstall Test (Requires Admin)
3. Create IntuneWin Package
4. Upload to Intune

Continue?
config_warning_msg: Intune Upload is NOT configured. Steps will stop after packaging. Continue?
ai_explain_smartscreen: SmartScreen warns about 'Unknown Publisher' if the app is not signed. You can sign it using a certificate in the Release Workflow.
ai_explain_winget: Winget is the Windows Package Manager. SwitchCraft can detect if an installer is available on Winget and generate install scripts for it.
ai_explain_intune: To deploy via Intune, you need to wrap the installer into an .intunewin file. SwitchCraft automates this in the 'Intune Utility' tab.
ai_explain_psexec: Testing as SYSTEM user is crucial because Intune installs run as SYSTEM. Use PSExec (checked in settings) to simulate this.
privacy_note_local: Privacy Note: This AI runs locally. No data leaves your machine.
privacy_note_cloud: âš ï¸ Privacy Warning: Data is sent to {provider} for processing!
winget_install_scope_msg:
Install for All Users (Machine)?

No = Current User only
winget_wau_info_msg:
We recommend using Winget-AutoUpdate (WAU) for the best experience.

This external project handles updates reliably.
SwitchCraft simply points you to their documentation for setup.
winget_dl_error_no_file: Download finished but no installer found.
